actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to suspend U.S. participation in the activities of the United Nations General Assembly until the Congress approves renewal of such participation.

summary.text: Suspends, under the United Nations Participation Act of 1945, United States participation in the activities of the United Nations General Assembly until the Congress approves renewal of such participation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to suspend U.S. participation in the activities of the United Nations General Assembly until the Congress approves renewal of such participation.
